languages.text: Если сдаться кашлю и лечь, станет легче, и легкие перестанут гореть.
If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.
languages.original_text: Если сдаться кашлю и лечь, станет легче, и легкие перестанут гореть.

traits.locale_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.
If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.
If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.
If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.
If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

languages.text: 只要你忍住咳嗽，躺在地上，你的呼吸就会变得更加平顺，肺也不会继续火烧火燎地疼。
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: 只要你忍住咳嗽，躺在地上，你的呼吸就会变得更加平顺，肺也不会继续火烧火燎地疼。

languages.text: 咳に音を上げて横になれば、呼吸は楽になり肺が燃えるような感覚は止むだろう。
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: 咳に音を上げて横になれば、呼吸は楽になり肺が燃えるような感覚は止むだろう。

languages.text: Si vous cédez à la toux et vous allongez, vous respirerez plus facilement et vos poumons cesseront de brûler.
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Si vous cédez à la toux et vous allongez, vous respirerez plus facilement et vos poumons cesseront de brûler.

languages.text: Si te rindes a la tos y te acuestas, podrás respirar con mayor facilidad y te dejarán de arder los pulmones.
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Si te rindes a la tos y te acuestas, podrás respirar con mayor facilidad y te dejarán de arder los pulmones.

languages.text: Wenn du den Husten zulässt und dich hinlegst, kannst du besser atmen und seine Lungen hören auf zu brennen.
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Wenn du den Husten zulässt und dich hinlegst, kannst du besser atmen und seine Lungen hören auf zu brennen.

languages.text: Öksürüğe teslim olup uzanırsan nefes alman kolaylaşacak ve ciğerlerin yanmayacak.
languages.original_text: If you surrender to the cough and lie down, it will be easier to breathe and your lungs will stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Öksürüğe teslim olup uzanırsan nefes alman kolaylaşacak ve ciğerlerin yanmayacak.
